# Basic Unigram Features
head_0_word+head_0_pos
head_0_word
head_0_pos
child_0_word+child_0_pos
child_0_word
child_0_pos
head_0_word+head_0_lemma
head_0_lemma
child_0_word+child_0_lemma
child_0_lemma

# Morphological Features
head_0_morph_case
child_0_morph_case
head_0_pos+head_0_morph_case
child_0_pos+child_0_morph_case
head_0_pos+head_0_morph_case+child_0_pos+child_0_morph_case

# Basic Bigram Features
head_0_word+head_0_pos+child_0_word+child_0_pos
head_0_pos+child_0_word+child_0_pos
head_0_word+child_0_word+child_0_pos
head_0_word+head_0_pos+child_0_pos
head_0_word+head_0_pos+child_0_word
head_0_word+child_0_word
head_0_pos+child_0_pos

# In between POS features
head_0_pos+between_0_pos+child_0_pos

# Context (Surrounding Word) Features
head_0_pos+head_1_pos+child_-1_pos+child_0_pos
head_-1_pos+head_0_pos+child_-1_pos+child_0_pos
head_0_pos+head_1_pos+child_0_pos+child_1_pos
head_-1_pos+head_0_pos+child_0_pos+child_1_pos
